member.summary: The message ID which is set by the provider

member.summary: The Priority on this message

member.name: P:Apache.NMS.EMS.Message.NMSRedelivered
member.summary: Returns true if this message has been redelivered to this or another consumer before being acknowledged successfully.

member.name: P:Apache.NMS.EMS.Message.NMSReplyTo
member.summary: The destination that the consumer of this message should send replies to

member.name: P:Apache.NMS.EMS.Message.NMSTimestamp
member.summary: The timestamp of when the message was pubished in UTC time. If the publisher disables setting the timestamp on the message, the time will be set to the start of the UNIX epoch (1970-01-01 00:00:00).

member.summary: Waits until a message is available and returns it

member.summary: If a message is available within the timeout duration it is returned otherwise this method returns null

member.summary: If a message is available immediately it is returned otherwise this method returns null

member.name: M:Apache.NMS.EMS.MessageConsumer.Close
member.summary: Closes the message consumer.
member.remarks: Clients should close message consumers them when they are not needed. This call blocks until a receive or message listener in progress has completed. A blocked message consumer receive call returns null when this message consumer is closed.
